r.d: This extension uses libgearman library to provide API for communicating with gearmand, and writing clients and workers.
r.n: - Initial PECL import - Reworked client/worker/task/job objects. - made all class/methods conform to php coding standards - Added $obj->returnCode() to all objects - Fixed compile issues with PHP 5.1 and 5.3 - Added in ARG_INFO macros to make reflection work - Updated constants to
